sentences.sContent: Hey, this may be a way of getting rid of Dean Higgins.
sentences.sCn: 嘿，这可能是一个摆脱希金斯院长的一个方法。

sentences.sContent: He interpreted the role of Professor Higgins wonderfully.
sentences.sCn: 他非常出色地扮演了希金斯这个角色。

sentences.sContent: He is also, like Higgins, one of the coolest and most tenacious of competitors.
sentences.sCn: 如同希金斯一样，他也是最为优秀，最为顽强的选手之一。
